title: X4: Foundations – v5.00 (474665 + 475121 HotFix) + 5 DLCs & Bonus Content
body:
X4: Foundations – v5.00 (474665 + 475121 HotFix) + 5 DLCs & Bonus Content


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Strategy, Open world, Pirate/Privateer, 3D, Spacecraft
Company: Egosoft
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI12
Original Size: 23.6 GB
Repack Size: from 10.3 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: BayFiles
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on X4_Tides_of_Avarice-FLT ISO release: flt-x4_tides_of_avarice.iso (20,198,250,496 bytes)
  • Missing Russian and French localizations (4.2 GB) & Bonus soundtracks/wallpapers (571 MB) added, thanks to Christsnatcher!
  • Game version is v5.00 (474665) by default; You can update it to v5.00 (475121 HotFix) by copying everything from “_HotFix” to game root, thanks to Aiakos
  • Pre-order Bonus, Collector’s Edition Content, Split Vendetta, Cradle of Humanity and Tides of Avarice DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when installed with all components)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of bonus content (OSTs, Wallpapers, Artbook, Novel, Encyclopedia), credits video & voiceovers packs you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 23.6 to 10.3~13 GB for any single language)
  • Installation takes 6-20 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 22.3 GB
  • Copy the corresponding “lang.dat” file from “_Language Changer” subfolder to game root to change the game language (doesn’t apply with Russian/French localizations, they work only in installed language)
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

X4 will allow you to fly all ships personally. From small scouts over a wide range of ship classes up to the biggest carrier, everything can be piloted from the cockpit or an external view.

A big focus in the development of X4 has been to achieve a seamless and immersive experience when moving between ships. You can leave a ship, climb down a ladder, walk over the dock of a large space station into another ship you may have parked there and replace the pilot that was working for you just by clicking on his chair.

You can skip downloading of bonus content, credits video & voiceovers packs you don’t need. Here is the list of optional/selective files:
  • fg-selective-eng-ger-and-others.bin (required for all languages, but Russian and French)
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-optional-credits.bin
  • fg-optional-bonus-content.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with French UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “optional/selective” files, but download fg-selective-french.bin & all main files (01-10)

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is partially backwards compatible with my previous X4 repack. You can rehash fg-02.bin and fg-10.bin to save 2.9 GB of traffic.
